title: Eccomerce
description: Your one-stop shop for quality products, exclusive deals, and seamless online shopping

title: Linkedin Clone
description: Developed a LinkedIn-like platform featuring user authentication, and post creation to simulate a professional social network. Utilized React.js, Redux Toolkit, React Router DOM, and Firebase for backend integration. The project enhanced my skills in building scalable, interactive applications and leveraging Firebase for real-time updates and secure data handling

title: CRUD Application
description: Developed a dynamic CRUD application using React and TypeScript, enabling seamless data management with create, read, update, and delete functionalities. Integrated with Firebase and designed a responsive, high-performance user interface to meet user needs efficiently.

title: Safety Code
description: Professional programming solutions tailored to elevate your business with custom development, expert consulting, and innovative technology
